imgSlider.reviewCoffe: Everything perfect. The location in the immediate vicinity of the bridge and walking distance from the center was a dream. It was clean, the hostess was very helpful.
imgSlider.reviewBath: We have never stayed in such a clean environment with attention to detail! all impeccable from A to Z. Absolute hospitality and availability we will definitely return
